jobs.name: Morning Briefing
jobs.job: Generate my morning briefing: weather, calendar summary, top 3 news items, today's priorities

jobs.name: Sales Pipeline Monitor
jobs.job: Check sales pipeline for stalled deals (>7 days no activity) and overdue follow-ups. Alert me if any found.

jobs.name: Email Inbox Triage
jobs.job: Check inbox for new emails, classify by urgency, summarize any marked critical

jobs.name: Disk Space Monitor
jobs.command: df -h / | awk 'NR==2 {if ($5+0 > 90) print "WARNING: Disk usage at " $5}'

jobs.name: Service Health Check
jobs.failure_job: The health check for localhost:8080 failed. Investigate and report.

jobs.name: Weekly Summary
jobs.job: Generate a weekly summary: tasks completed, deals closed, key metrics, priorities for next week

jobs.name: Content Ideas Research
jobs.job: Search for 5 trending topics in my industry and save content ideas to ~/.osa/data/content-ideas.md
